parameters.name: WhichConfigurations
parameters.description: One of the following options in swInConfigurationOpts_e : swAllConfiguration swSpecifyConfiguration swThisConfiguration swSpeedpakConfiguration

parameters.name: ConfigNames
parameters.description: Array of configuration names to which to apply the mark; valid only if WhichConfigurations is set to swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

title: IConfigurationManager.AddRebuildSaveMark
description: Adds marks indicating whether the specified configurations need to be rebuilt and their configuration data saved every time the model document is saved.
signature:
System.Boolean AddRebuildSaveMark( 
   System.Int32
WhichConfigurations
,
   System.Object
ConfigNames
)

parameters.name: WhichConfigurations
parameters.description: One of the following options in swInConfigurationOpts_e : swAllConfiguration swSpecifyConfiguration swThisConfiguration swSpeedpakConfiguration

parameters.name: ConfigNames
parameters.description: Array of configuration names to which to apply the mark; valid only if WhichConfigurations is set to swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

returns: True if configurations marked successfully, false if not
